abstract: Bill Cunningham documents images of women wearing bright patterns and colors on the streets around New York City.
lead_paragraph: Patterns and colors, particularly of the Native American variety, were an uplifting sight during the post-holiday slump.

byline.original: By BILL CUNNINGHAM and JOANNA NIKAS

snippet: Patterns and colors, particularly of the Native American variety, were an uplifting sight during the post-holiday slump.

headline.main: Bill Cunningham | Stripes of all Sizes
